CollectionType.description: The CollectionType captures collections of any MAEC entities, including Malware Subjects.

id.description: The required id field specifies a unique ID for this Collection.

name.description: The name field specifies the name of the Collection.

maec_entity_type.description: The required maec_entity_type field specifies the type of MAEC entity that is captured in the Collection, via the CollectionEntityTypeEnum. Example types would be 'objects' or 'various'. The default values is 'various'.

association_type.description: The association type field specifies the nature of the contents of the Collection, via the CollectionAssociationTypeEnum.

entity_references.description: The entity_references field captures a reference to one or more MAEC entities (Action, Behavior, etc.) that are contained in the Collection.

association_metadata.$ref: #/PLACEHOLDER FOR NOW - need to rethink this field
association_metadata.description: The association_metadata field captures metadata that may be relevant to specific association types as captured in the association_type field.

CollectionEntityTypeEnum.description: The CollectionEntityTypeEnum is a non-exhaustive enumeration of entity types that can be captured as part of a collection.

CollectionAssociationTypeEnum.description: The CollectionAssociationTypeEnum is a non-exhaustive enumeration of association types that can be captures as part of a collection.
